summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MenuMaker Editor UI/UX improvements. Successfully verified all 10 key features including organized tab navigation (Text, Style, BG, Border), background image upload with drag-drop functionality, preset backgrounds with thumbnails, simple and decorative border options, color pickers with visual feedback, font selectors, size sliders with px badges, section dividers, and AI-powered item dialog. All visual feedback elements including checkmarks and selection indicators are working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Session expires frequently requiring repeated login during testing

passed_tests: Tab Navigation - All 4 tabs (Text, Style, BG, Border) accessible and organized
Background Image Upload - Drag-drop custom image with preview and checkmark selection
Preset Backgrounds - 6 options (None, Elegant Texture, Wood Grain, Marble, Linen, Dark Slate) with thumbnails
Simple Menu Border - 5 styles (None, Solid, Dashed, Dotted, Double) with width and color controls
Decorative Frame Borders - 7 ornamental styles (None, Elegant, Ornate, Classic, Floral, Art Deco, Vintage)
Color Pickers - Preset color swatches with checkmark on selected color
HEX Input Fields - Custom color input for all color pickers
Font Selection - Dropdown shows fonts in their actual style
Size Sliders - Show current value in px badge (800px, 50px, 24px, 40px)
Section Dividers - Title and category dividers with style options
Add/Edit Item Dialog - Opens with AI description generation button
Visual Feedback - Checkmarks and highlights show selected options
Menu Preview - Real-time preview updates in center panel
Save and Export - Save and Export PDF buttons functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor improvement needed: Session management could be enhanced to reduce login frequency during extended editor usage. All core UI/UX features are working perfectly as designed.
